name: mini MIKE
description:
mini MIKE is a currently a very early work in progress with only a few screens and does NOT represent the final game!!  It is up to you if you wish to donate to help keep the retro fires burning :)

--------------------------------------------

mini MIKE is about an explorer trapped on an alien world where everything is huge.  Can you help Mike solve the puzzles, avoid the Nasties and escape with his life?

It is a single-player game designed to work in a Commodore 64 emulator or actual hardware.  It comes as a compressed .prg file (Exomizer compressed). Just run it as normal in an emulator or on real hardware...

After completion, the game might come out as a physical item later on, ie. tape, disk, etc. as a purchase option for Commodore 64 hardware.
